summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating the alley in Block 32, Brooklyn Addition, et al, on the petition of the Board of Regents of the University of Washington; abandoning certain sewer pipes and storm drains in said vacated alleys, streets, and avenues and authorizing the transfer thereof to the Board of Regents of the University of Washington; and accepting easements over portions of the east one-half of Section 17, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., and portions of said vacated alleys, streets, and avenues for sanitary sewer purposes.
